title: User Authentication and Security Setup
summary: Implement secure login with multi-factor authentication and access controls.
description: Develop a robust user authentication module that enables customers to securely log in using multi-factor authentication. This includes password management, OTP verification, session handling, and logout features. Implement encryption standards for sensitive data transmission and storage. Configure role-based access controls to ensure users can only access functionalities relevant to their roles or profiles within the banking system.

title: User Profile and Role Management
summary: Create and manage user profiles with role-based permissions.
description: Design a user profile management system that stores user information, linked accounts, and access permissions. Implement administrative controls to manage and assign user roles. This will facilitate differentiated access based on the user’s profile, ensuring that only authorized users can view or modify certain banking services or data within the platform.

title: Responsive Portal UI/UX Design
summary: Develop a modern, responsive, and intuitive user interface for the bank’s self-service portal.
description: Build a responsive front-end interface accessible via desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. The UI/UX should prioritize simplicity, speed, and easy navigation while adhering to the bank's branding guidelines. Include accessibility features and ensure compatibility with all major browsers. The design should provide a consistent experience across devices and allow customers to easily access and manage their banking needs.

title: Personalized Dashboard Development
summary: Create a dashboard to display personalized banking products and services.
description: Develop a customizable, data-driven dashboard that presents banking products, services, and account statuses tailored to the user’s profile and eligibility. Integrate analytics to recommend banking products. Ensure real-time synchronization with the bank’s core system for accurate information display and enable quick access to the most frequently used features.

title: Account Opening and Service Request Workflows
summary: Implement workflows for account opening and service modification requests.
description: Design and automate user-friendly workflows that allow customers to open new accounts or modify existing services directly from the portal. Focus on minimizing the number of steps and form complexity while maintaining compliance requirements. Include the ability to upload supporting documents and validate data in real-time before submission.

title: Request Status Tracking and Notifications
summary: Provide real-time request tracking and automated email notifications.
description: Build features that enable customers to view and monitor the status of their submitted requests in real time. Integrate an automated notification system that sends email or in-app updates about any status changes, approvals, or required actions. Ensure reliable communication through secure email protocols and enhance user transparency throughout the process.

title: Saved Drafts and Document Management
summary: Allow users to save incomplete applications and upload documents securely.
description: Implement functionality for customers to save drafts of partially completed forms, which can be resumed later without losing data. Add secure document management capabilities that allow users to upload, store, and manage required documentation for various banking processes. Ensure encryption at rest and in transit, with proper access controls on uploaded files.

title: Core Banking System Integration
summary: Integrate the self-service portal with the existing core banking system.
description: Establish APIs and integration layers connecting the self-service portal with the bank’s core systems to ensure real-time data exchange for accounts, transactions, and service requests. Maintain synchronization and ensure performance optimization to minimize latency. Implement fallback and error handling mechanisms for seamless data consistency and transaction safety.

title: Portal Database and Performance Optimization
summary: Implement a dedicated database to enhance performance and reliability.
description: Design and deploy a robust, scalable database architecture for the self-service portal. Ensure caching and indexing strategies for fast data retrieval, while maintaining separation from the core banking database. Introduce monitoring and optimization tools to maintain high availability and performance during peak usage periods.

title: Audit and Interaction History Management
summary: Maintain a detailed record of all user interactions and system activities.
description: Develop a comprehensive audit trail to log all user actions, transactions, and modifications within the portal. Provide users with access to their interaction history while securely storing logs for compliance and internal review. Implement efficient archiving and retrieval processes to ensure data integrity and transparency.
